title: UN Chief calls on the EU to cut emissions by 55% by 2030
lead: The UN Secretary General said while he applauded EU’s climate achievements, the world is still ‘nowhere near the climate race’s finish line’

title: Projects awarded £10m to plant 84k trees across the UK
lead: A total of 134,000 trees are planned to be planted through the Urban Tree Challenge Fund

title: Noble Foods pays £50k for polluting stream with wastewater
lead: The money has been given to the Lincolnshire Rivers Trust to fund environmental improvements following an investigation by the Environment Agency

title: UK and Thailand to work together on energy efficiency
lead: The UK’s ASEAN Low Carbon Energy Programme aims to encourage the transition to low carbon energy in Thailand while creating real energy cost savings for households and businesses

title: Government extends Green Homes Grant by a year
lead: The year-long extension will give homeowners across England more time to have energy efficiency upgrades, helping up to 600,000 households save up to £600 on their energy bills

title: UK doubles Green Recovery Fund to £80m to support jobs and create new national parks
lead: It is part of the government’s plans to help kickstart the nation’s green recovery, including the expansion of protected landscapes, increased access to nature and stronger flood resilience

title: Webinar: Energy management as a route to securing business profitability
lead: This webinar will be brought to you live from from 14:00 on December 3rd!

title: EDF to start ‘defuelling phase’ of 45-year-old nuclear power station by July 2022
lead: The closure of Hinkley Point B was originally scheduled for March 2023

title: IRENA and GWEC team up to boost renewables uptake globally
lead: Around a third of all new renewable capacity added in 2019 was from wind power and data from IRENA suggests wind power, together with solar, will dominate future capacity growth

title: Webinar: Energy optioneering: How large companies make energy projects work commercially
lead: This webinar will be brought to you live from 11:00 on December 3rd
